title: Enhancing Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Online Forum-Based Argumentation Skills Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced domain knowledge in professional fields (medical/legal/technical) and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Systematically construct argumentation structures (claim-evidence-counterclaim) analyzing complex social issues three or more times in VR simulation environments
Write five or more peer feedbacks in online forum discussions based on valid evidence and logical consistency
Consistently practice maintaining critical thinking while respecting opposing perspectives during group discussions for four weeks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
